Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    The Card class provides the means to create a Card object, which represents a card from a standard 52 card deck. After its creatiom, the properties of the Card - rank and suit, may not be altered. For our purposes, two card are equal if they are of the same rank.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Card other)
        The equals method compares two cards to determine if the cards are of equal rank.
        Parameters:
        other - The other card.
        Returns:
        A boolean corresponding to whether the two cards are of equal rank (true) or are of different rank (false).

      • isGreater

        public boolean isGreater(Card other)
        The isGreater method compares two cards to determine if this card possesses a rank greater than that of the other card.
        Parameters:
        other - The other card.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether or not this card's rank is greater than the other card's rank.
